name: Jellyfish: The Healing Friend
description: Players step into the role of one of a few different people who become involved in jellyfish breeding. After picking their character, players bring their new jellies home and get started taking care of them. Detailed 3D jellyfish float freely in their tank, presented at a gentle pace with relaxing ("healing") music by Japanese band Gontiti. Players are given a wide variety of different ways to take care of their jellyfish, including feeding and other standard care techniques, and are able to breed their jellyfish over a long period of time.
